metadata.title: CVE-2023-46317 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Knot Resolver before 5.7.0 performs many TCP reconnections upon receivingcertain nonsensical responses from servers.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-46317` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

knot-resolver - 5.7.2-1
knot-resolver-module-http - 5.7.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: knot-resolver package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.7.2-1').
